org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.tasks

接口 StatefulTask

  • 所有已知实现类:
    OneInputStreamTask, SourceStreamTask, StoppableSourceStreamTask, StreamIterationHead, StreamIterationTail, StreamTask, TwoInputStreamTask

    public interface StatefulTask
    This interface must be implemented by any invokable that has recoverable state and participates in checkpointing.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void abortCheckpointOnBarrier(long checkpointId, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Aborts a checkpoint as the result of receiving possibly some checkpoint barriers, but at least one CancelCheckpointMarker.
      void notifyCheckpointComplete(long checkpointId)
      Invoked when a checkpoint has been completed, i.e., when the checkpoint coordinator has received the notification from all participating tasks.
      void setInitialState(TaskStateSnapshot taskStateHandles)
      Sets the initial state of the operator, upon recovery.
      boolean triggerCheckpoint(CheckpointMetaData checkpointMetaData, CheckpointOptions checkpointOptions)
      This method is called to trigger a checkpoint, asynchronously by the checkpoint coordinator.
      void triggerCheckpointOnBarrier(CheckpointMetaData checkpointMetaData, CheckpointOptions checkpointOptions, CheckpointMetrics checkpointMetrics)
      This method is called when a checkpoint is triggered as a result of receiving checkpoint barriers on all input streams.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setInitialState

        void setInitialState(TaskStateSnapshot taskStateHandles)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the initial state of the operator, upon recovery. The initial state is typically a snapshot of the state from a previous execution.
        参数:
        taskStateHandles - All state handle for the task.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • triggerCheckpoint

        boolean triggerCheckpoint(CheckpointMetaData checkpointMetaData,
                          CheckpointOptions checkpointOptions)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is called to trigger a checkpoint, asynchronously by the checkpoint coordinator.

        This method is called for tasks that start the checkpoints by injecting the initial barriers, i.e., the source tasks. In contrast, checkpoints on downstream operators, which are the result of receiving checkpoint barriers, invoke the triggerCheckpointOnBarrier(CheckpointMetaData, CheckpointOptions, CheckpointMetrics) method.

        参数:
        checkpointMetaData - Meta data for about this checkpoint
        checkpointOptions - Options for performing this checkpoint
        返回:
        false if the checkpoint can not be carried out, true otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • triggerCheckpointOnBarrier

        void triggerCheckpointOnBarrier(CheckpointMetaData checkpointMetaData,
                                CheckpointOptions checkpointOptions,
                                CheckpointMetrics checkpointMetrics)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is called when a checkpoint is triggered as a result of receiving checkpoint barriers on all input streams.
        参数:
        checkpointMetaData - Meta data for about this checkpoint
        checkpointOptions - Options for performing this checkpoint
        checkpointMetrics - Metrics about this checkpoint
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions thrown as the result of triggering a checkpoint are forwarded.

      • abortCheckpointOnBarrier

        void abortCheckpointOnBarrier(long checkpointId,
                              java.lang.Throwable cause)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Aborts a checkpoint as the result of receiving possibly some checkpoint barriers, but at least one CancelCheckpointMarker.

        This requires implementing tasks to forward a CancelCheckpointMarker to their outputs.

        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint to be aborted.
        cause - The reason why the checkpoint was aborted during alignment
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • notifyCheckpointComplete

        void notifyCheckpointComplete(long checkpointId)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Invoked when a checkpoint has been completed, i.e., when the checkpoint coordinator has received the notification from all participating tasks.
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint that is complete..
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - The notification method may forward its exceptions.
